Title: Follower
Description: BuddyTracker for Windows Runtime (Windows Phone) using Twitter with CoreTweet.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
BuddyTracker for Windows Runtime (Windows Phone) using Twitter with CoreTweet.
http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/follower/30b1de66-b888-4442-991c-35e1ff124ef8



This application is built for Faculty of Science in Novi Sad Serbia as a small individual project to demo usage of MVVM pattern and asynchronous programming, with CoreTweet for posting and reading tweets.
